## Instructions for Day 22: Public profile

1.  **Get the challenge:** Fork [the parent collection `Day 22: Public profile`](https://www.postman.com/postman/workspace/30-days-of-postman-for-developers/documentation/1559645-5cbfbc58-e32f-4e62-b6ee-558b38701d71) from the main workspace to your own public workspace.

item.name: Public profile
item.description:
It's time to work on your next challenge.

1. **Groom your public profile**: You've already [enabled your public profile](https://go.postman.co/settings/me). Now let's put our best foot forward.
  - Add a public profile and cover photo
  - Add a brief bio
  - Add a link to your website or social media accounts
  - Find the `Public profile URL` to see what it looks like
1. **Update your public workspace overview**: You've already updated the [visibility of your workspace to public](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collaborating-in-postman/using-workspaces/creating-workspaces/#creating-a-public-workspace). Click on the workspace name next to the globe icon in the top left to open the overview tab. Here's some optional suggestions to personalize this workspace:
  - Update the summary and description
  - Change the name of the workspace 

  At the bottom, review a count of all the collections you've forked to this workspace, along with all the other entities and a running log of your updates.
1. **Leave a comment**: Leave a [comment](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collaborating-in-postman/commenting-on-collections/#commenting-on-a-collection) on the collection or folder and [tag](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collaborating-in-postman/commenting-on-collections/#tagging-members-in-comments) yourself in the comment.
1. **Search for your workspace**: Use the search bar in the top center to find your public workspace. This will be easier to find if you gave your workspace a unique name in the first challenge. Updates to this data will take a while to index in the search results.

That's all for this challenge. There is no local validation check this time, but this information will come in handy for the final check.
